means: 以…为地面材料的；铺有…地板的

sentence.Network_en: He was floored by the announcement.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个通告使他不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: He seemed floored by a string of scandals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他似乎被一连串的丑闻搞得茫然失措。

sentence.Network_en: They had to cross the large marble-floored hall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们得穿过一个铺有大理石地面的宽敞大厅。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I was floored by that question ., 我被那个问题难倒了.
I was floored by his and to admit defeat ., 我被他驳倒了 , 只得承认失败.
the room was floored with boards .这个房间是用木板铺地的。

entry.tran: 以…为地面材料的;铺有…地板的
entry.def: A room or part of a room that is floored with a particular material has a floor made of that material.

example.ex: The aisle was floored with ancient bricks.
example.tran: 过道由古旧的砖块铺就。

auth_sentence.content: This unanticipated onslaught of goodwill totally floored me.
